column4: Okay, here's the deal. I've been working with Xorg for four years. This new version and its xorg.conf setup have got my head spinning. My resolution and driver were just fine until I rebooted. I've configured it with the "low graphics mode" dialog and a number of other things. nvidia-settings claims that my nvidia driver isn't actually enabled, and it doesn't appear to be, but Ubuntu seems to think it is. Furthermore, I can't obtain
what drivers have you installed? The nvidia binary ones?
